CmdLine: set -ex     && apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps         build-base         ruby-dev         libffi-dev     && gem uninstall remote_syslog_logger     && gem install fluent-plugin-concat fluent-plugin-kubernetes_remote_syslog fluent-plugin-logzio remote_syslog_sender     && sed 's/type/@type/g' -i /fluentd/etc/kubernetes.conf     && apk del .build-deps     && gem sources --clear-all     && chmod +x /fluentd/entrypoint.sh     && rm -rf /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /usr/lib/ruby/gems/*/cache/*.gem
Commands.Name: run
